page.title: 08EMPLOYMENT IN SAMPFORD
page.content: In Sampford, from our survey, the people are employed in many different kinds of work. One of the most popular types of work is farming, especially in an area with so many farms. Some people are farmers while others do farming jobs. Teaching is another popular type of work with the Sampford people. Sales men and engineers come high on the list of employees. In most families only one person works. From our survey it is noticable that many people who live in the Sampfords have to travel to go to their work. The farmers were the people who lived within five miles of their work. Teachers often travel between ten and twenty miles to reach their school. Other people travelled even further. However, there are several people who work at home.
